message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  I know it's worth a lot to you, but this price reflects its value to me as well. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can only afford to pay $9,500 for it. Please let me know if this is within your consideration.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for something a bit closer to my initial price. How about $9,750?  It's a fair compromise and would allow us to both get a good deal.
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to offer $9,600 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
